comments:
When I create a file with the BPWS editor, close Eclipse and start it again, I 
get the message "An error has occurred when creating this editor." when trying 
to open the BPEL4WS file with the BPWS editor. I can, however, create another 
file from scratch without problems. 
 
Here are the session data (I use the FreeBSD port of Java 1.4.2 with Eclipse 
3.0): 
eclipse.buildId=200406251208 
java.version=1.4.2-p6 
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc. 
BootLoader constants: OS=freebsd, ARCH=x86, WS=gtk, NL=nl_NL

the editor. (the com.ibm.cs.bpws plug-in)
